SELECT student.*, banji.class_name as banji_name, bus_base_info.number as bus_number, bus_base_info.plate_number as bus_plate_number, user_bzr.`name` AS charge_teacher_name, user_bzr.phone AS charge_teacher_phone, bus_stations.station_name AS board_station_morning_name, bs_a.station_name AS board_station_afternoon_name FROM student LEFT JOIN banji ON banji.id = student.banji LEFT JOIN bus_line ON bus_line.id = student.bus_line_morning LEFT JOIN bus_base_info ON bus_base_info.id = bus_line.bus_base_info LEFT JOIN bus_stations ON bus_stations.id = student.board_station_morning LEFT JOIN bus_stations AS bs_a ON bs_a.id = student.board_station_afternoon LEFT JOIN user AS user_bzr ON banji.charge_teacher = user_bzr.id WHERE student.valid = 1
and bus_base_info.number = #{busNumber}
